children.title: Welcome to Our Team!
children.content: We're excited to have you join us. This onboarding journey will help you get familiar with our company culture, policies, and your new role.

children.title: What to Expect
children.content: Over the next few modules, you'll learn about our company values, meet your team members, understand our policies, and explore your benefits.

children.title: Your Success Matters
children.content: We believe that a well-onboarded employee is a successful employee. Take your time with each module, ask questions, and don't hesitate to reach out to your manager or HR team.

children.title: Ready to Begin?
children.content: You're all set to start your onboarding journey! Click 'Complete Welcome' to move on to the next module and continue your progress.

children.title: Employee Handbook
children.content: Our employee handbook covers all aspects of working at our company, including workplace conduct, dress code, attendance policies, and more.

children.title: Code of Conduct
children.content: Our code of conduct establishes the standards of behavior expected from all employees. This includes professional conduct, conflict of interest policies, confidentiality requirements, and anti-harassment guidelines.
